article_title: Focus On Affordable Care Act Will Help Drive ADP's sales

article_metadata.author: Great Speculations

og.description: We believe that ADP's focus on increasing awareness about the ACA will help drive sales of its ACA-oriented products. ADP will likely benefit from its position as a major player in the Human Capital Management industry, which will enable it to tap a large market of businesses looking for solutions that will help maintain compliance with the ACA.
